programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us
programme.desc: Join elf twins Liza and Ben to learn more about sounds, how to find them and how to recreate them. Follow them as they whizz away on exciting adventures together to investigate where different familiar sounds are coming from. Play along with the twins and encourage your child to listen and identify the sounds you hear together. Can you work out the source before the twins do?

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: DuckSchool
programme.desc: In a forest kindergarden, woodland animals who call it their home are learning the basics of English from their helpful fairy teacher, Miss Sunshine. Learn some brand new words and practice your counting skills, or listen carefully to the stories Miss Sunshine has to tell. With Duckschool we can learn about so many things! There might even be some special guests to meet along the way.

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The protagonists of The Shapies introduce us to the world of shapes through their adventures. They show us where they fit in, what things they resemble, how they transform if they are together and how they make up entire stories.

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends
programme.desc: Hubbi and Friends are a group of handymen that embark on a series of exciting adventures on their travels through the countryside. They use their passion for fixing to fix everything that they find, even if it doesnt need fixing. The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Sippi Sappi
programme.desc: Sippi Sappi is an educational show about a couple of friends who love rollerskating around whilst on holiday in the countryside. The programme aims to encourage its young viewers to engage in sporting activites, encourage creative thinking and relate to other childrens adventures. Aired on Duck TV Sippi Sappi is an all round fun way to get your little ones active and excited about sport.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Groups
programme.desc: This adorable fox will help your little ones to learn how to categorise objects. This show is enhanced with sufficient interaction with the children that its aimed at, for example the learning of older children is enhanced by asking them questions such as "whats different" between two or more objects. For younger children it is more beneficial to just point out these differences or similarities.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Enlightment Corner
programme.desc: This show makes learning fun! As with the majority of Duck TVs productions, this cartoon offers both educational and entertainment benefits. Your little ones will no doubt love following these fun little stories, and will also learn to identify everyday objects along the way, and understand their uses, too. This is essential to their development, and will also help them to gain new skills.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Pixie 2
programme.desc: Join Lilali, an elf magician. who just loves to perform his magic tricks. This programme, for very young viewers, can help little ones learn basic vocabulary. Watch with children and repeat the words of the objects on the screen to teach them short, simple words. After you have watched the programme you can repeat the vocabulary from the programme whilst playing to reinforce the words learnt.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Zack and Ziggy
programme.desc: Meet a little geek boy named Zack and his best friend, a dog named Ziggy as they help children learn the concept of size through funny adventures, laughter and games. Join them as they make size based line ups, groups, and comparisons, having lots of fun along the way.

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Dinoland
programme.desc: Go on adventures with four adorable baby dinosaurs as they explore their environment and work together to solve tricky problems. Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Ducky Adventures
programme.desc: Every day is a different adventure for Ducky! This animated show lets toddlers and pre-schoolers to join Ducky to learn through daily activities. This series is brought to you by DuckTV, which works with child psychologists in creating programmes for babies and toddlers. Ducky Adventures has been designed to help your child develop their observational skills whilst also letting them use their imagination and creativity.

programme.title: Leon-ART
programme.desc: Join the painter bear as he draws and paints friends for himself to play with. What are his painted friends today? The series is a perfect bedtime story to relax before going to bed. The bear helps to encourage imagination and develop basic visual and motor skills. A whole family can paint together for the perfect bonding activity of parents and children.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo PLUS
programme.desc: Join the two familiar characters who have become preschoolers but still love fun adventures which teach them about various useful things. In their amazing adventures, Mimo and Bobo learn about friendship, sharing, helping others and more, helping children develop their social and observational skills.

programme.title: Milo Dino
programme.desc: Following the adventures of a curious little dino boy in the Mesosoic era, as he discovers the world around him. Join Milo and his friends and family to find out how dinosaurs lived. The programme helps little children develop their social skills, as well as their imagination, introducing them to the era of dinosaurs.

programme.title: World of Toys
programme.desc: Enter a world of games and experience with us fantastic adventures or exercise your fingers and conjure up some exquisite art jewellery. No manuals are needed to do this. Create your own special story and discover new possibilities how to spend a moment together.

programme.title: Fireteam in Action
programme.desc: Fireteam in Action on Duck TV is an animated series revolving around great adventures of firemen. Kids find out about their significant work and learn the importance of helping each other in difficult situations. The series and its sweet characters teach the little viewers to give a helping hand and be responsible.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Doll Team
programme.desc: This cartoon is both incredibly entertaining, and educational. In accompanying these three friends, your child will learn social skills, and friendship. The trio that will take you on this journey are Bell, the sweetest flower-doll, Lilo, the cuddly teddy bear, and Fido, the incredibly playful kangaroo. The three friends are determined to help the inhabitants of the undergrowth however they can.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Ducky and Fluffy
programme.desc: The Ducky family has a brand new member! With the arrival of her little brother Fluffy, Ducky experiences a wide range of new emotions and finds herself in new situations. Stories are created with the support of child psychologists to help children adjust to the arrival of a new sibling.

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. Its fun for everyone to have a good meal, walk around the park and explore the world around them. Th cartoon stimulates childrens imagination and creativity, and it also has got tranquil sweet tunes that follow every adventure.

programme.title: Hipp-hopp Cactus
programme.desc: Join three houseplants and a busy little bee as they learn more about the objects, shapes and colours they find around their home. Once theyre sure no one is around, the trio of plants come to life and identify where to find them and how to use them properly. Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Happy Kingdom
programme.desc: Catching up with the adorable bunnies from Happy Meadows, Happy Kingdom introduces lots more fun characters such like a fearless-knight hedgehog and a caring cook-squirrel. Reinforcing the young viewers knowledge of different animals and developing their vocabulary in a new and fun way, Happy Kingdom is just as educational as it is exciting. Why not get involved and host an animal toy party whilst you watch.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Mimos World

programme.title: Ristorante
programme.desc: Welcome to the Ristorante, come in and find out how the restaurant works. Learn about all the different processes starting with the preparation and moving to the baking or the cooking, the serving and finally to the dish washing. Encourage your little ones to play pretend, cooking up some imaginary treats for you, your friends and family. Learn some new vocabulary, stimulate your senses and having fun.

programme.title: Toby McFly

programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Higher the Better
programme.desc: Come along with Kiteko the goofy giraffe and Umi the playful meerkat in Higher the Better as they watch the everyday life of toddlers and begin to learn about their everyday adventures! Travelling on field trips and making lots of fun when theyre playing, Higher the Better develops childrens social skills, encourages them to observe and think deeper about what they are watching on their screen.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy 2
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy are here to introduce little children to the concept of rhythm. The familiar duo go on many exciting adventures in which they encounter amazing animals who help them explore the wonderful world of rhythm through their clapping and tapping.

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Little Melodies
programme.desc: This show encourages creativity, as you learn lots of fun new songs. This skill can be extended to everyday life; sing these songs at bedtime, in the car, on a walk, whenever! This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

Make the most of these educational lessons with dinosaur puppets or soft toys.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Train
programme.desc: Join the friendly train conductor and adorable cartoon train as they go on magical journeys and gentle adventures, making sure all of their passengers get taken to the right place at the right time. The short stories are designed to teach your little ones about grouping and categories, using colour, shape, size and purpose to demonstrate this logical task.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

This sharpens the sense of hearing and nurtures any musical skills, aiding child development. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV aim to produce content that is both educational and entertaining.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Monica and Rudy
programme.desc: Monica and Rudy is a colorful animated series on Duck TV intended for the youngest viewers. Monica is a little girl who has a pet- a parrot named Rudy. Monica takes Rudy out of the cage and together they go on their little adventures- in the forest, in the park, or to the pond where they meet different animals and birds. Monica teaches Rudy to imitate the sounds made by the animals.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Puffy and Tubby
programme.desc: Join best friends Puffy and Tubby, a couple of guinea pigs who are always hungry, as they embark on journeys around their environment in the search for more and more food. With a focus on developing social skills, identifying new objects and introducing your little ones to various new adventures, Puffy and Tubby excels at combining developmental lessons with endless fun.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Animals

Learn up to 20 new words a day as your child has fun labelling the objects they see while searching for them in your own home.

programme.title: Risto Gusto
programme.desc: Basil, Yam and Oregano have their own restaurant and are always happy to treat their little friends to healthy food and drinks. programme.title: Doll Team to the Rescue

programme.title: Ducky and Friends

programme.title: Hubbi and Friends

The show teaches the incredibly important lesson that its okay to make mistakes, which promotes healthy interactions between parents and children.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Mimos World
programme.desc: Join some of our favourite Duck TV characters as they embark on lots of new adventures. Our little panda bear Mimo and his best friend Bobo from "Didy Baby" and "Mimo and Bobo" journey around Mimos world meeting new friends and having fun. This exciting new show puts a massive emphasis on the importance of friendship and teaches us all about different friendship values.

programme.title: Nature Dudes
programme.desc: Nature Dudes is a fun cartoon that helps its young viewers to learn about all things natural. They focus on teaching about identifying different animals, learning about their different habits and habitats. They also put a focus on seasons and the weather, helping its little viewers learn about rain and sunshine, in a fun and exciting way.

programme.title: Africa
programme.desc: Go on a journey through the continent of Africa and meet all of the native animals as they roam around having fun and playing games in their natural environment. Africa introduces its young viewers to a wider range of animals, including some lesser known ones that they probably havent heard of before, a great way for children to develop their cognitive and observational skills.

programme.title: Hop-hop
programme.desc: Hop-hop is a cartoon for the littlest viewers of 6 to 36 months old and their families. Its engaging and educational content together with peaceful music and colorful catching picture is very entertaining. Cute Bunnies do everything together- play, eat, brush their teeth, walk, run, swim, have fun.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. Lola is a playful young girl who helps us to identify different numbers, count from one to ten and develop our pre-math skills. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Finn and Fianna
programme.desc: Finn and Fianna, the two little elves, are studying their environment and discovering their environment with a lot of curiousity! Getting to know their surroundings and the basic attributes that exist within it, join Finn and Fianna as they use their senses of seeing, tasting, feeling and discovering to develop your little ones thinking skills as well as what they see!

programme.title: Fireteam
programme.desc: Hop on board the bright red fire truck and follow the three little firemen as they get to work keeping their village safe. These silent animated shorts are perfect for educating your child on the importance of safety and the role of the emergency services. Encourage your child to develop their ability to problem solve and improve their decision-making skills by identifying hazards and solutions together.

programme.title: Toby McFly
programme.desc: This imaginative and creative childrens animation follows the adventures of Toby McFly, a canine aviator who presents us with a birds eye view of the world. After flying over many fascinating landscapes, active animals, busy people, and interesting places, Toby lands his aircraft and shows us, in detail, what we have just seen from above. The show is educational, stimulating, and informative as well as being fun and entertaining.

programme.title: Cucu, Im here!
programme.desc: Have some fun with the Cucus as they play hide and seek. Cucu, Im here! follows the cucus as they go on lots of adventures, playing games and laughing all day! What better way to improve young viewers cognitive skills, introducing them to object permanence and developing their thinking skills. Cucu, Im here! is the perfect way to have some fun whilst learning something new.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Margo and Felix
programme.desc: Living and playing in a beautiful house is so much fun, but Margo and Felix also have to be responsible in order to look after the house. Join these two best friend for creative thinking and lots of games!

programme.title: Henrys Stories
programme.desc: Henry loves telling stories, but he needs your help to make sure its all in the correct order. Follow Henry in these silent animated shorts as he constructs stories with the help of his handy picture cards. Teach your children about logical thinking and deductive reasoning as you narrate the sequences together and solve his picture puzzles to see the story come to life.

programme.title: Didy Baby
programme.desc: Go on an adventure with a group of adorable baby animals in Didy Baby. The show teaches its tiny viewers social skills, and introduces them to problem solving and decision making.

programme.title: Mimos World

programme.title: Didy Baby

programme.title: Happy Garden
programme.desc: Come into the Happy Garden where fruits, vegetables and plants will dance to entertain you! Happy Garden was designed to aid the development of younger audiences, learning about the world around them,.

programme.title: Tempo Giusto
programme.desc: Learning about time can be hard, but Tempo Giusto makes it so much fun. Go on an adventure with Henry and Lola as they introduce you to the basics concepts of time, help you develop your pre-math skills and teach you about the sequencing of events. Lola uses her love of numbers to tell the time whilst Henry uses his amazing storytelling skills to show us what kids get up to at different times of the day.

programme.title: Lola and the Numbers
programme.desc: Lola and the Numbers makes counting fun for its littlest viewers. The most important viewing tips for parents and little ones is that we always count with Lola! whether its in English or your own language, counting aling is always fun!

programme.title: Dotty, the Kitty
programme.desc: Get creative with Dotty the Kitty and follow the dotted line left by the pencil to try and create a masterpiece. Uncover the final painting and unlock the imagination of your child all at the same time. Dotty the Kitty helps kids to develop their shape recognition, hand-eye coordination and their ability to associate objects with their realistic shapes and colours!

programme.title: Ducky and Friends
programme.desc: Childrens programme that follows the amazing adventures of a lovable little duck named Ducky, and a variety of her friends. By watching their escapades, young viewers will have lots of fun, and they will also have a chance to learn about friendship, sharing, and playing nicely with friends.

programme.title: Raul
programme.desc: Raul and Birdie are best friends. Raul is an adorable green hippopotamus who loves to go on exciting adventures and Birdie is his side kick. These two lovable characters find themselves in all sort of situations as they journey around the countryside, but with each others help they will always find their way out of any problem.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Cubie
programme.desc: Animated childrens series following Cubie the builder who has fantastic plans for new buildings. Cubie loves to build and, with help from his friends, the cheerful cubes, erects inventive new constructions. This enjoyable series from Duck TV helps children build their spatial awareness and observational skills while learning about new prepositions and the basics of building.

programme.title: Mimo and Bobo
programme.desc: Mimo, the cute little panda bear and his loyal friend Bobo, encourage you to describe and narrate what you see. Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Hubbi Will Take Care of It
programme.desc: Hubbi hippo, Matti beaver and Milo and the ultimate DIY trio, no task is too great for this ferocious three. They are determined to fix everything, helping everyone they meet along the way. No job is too big for this group of friends. This cartoon is not only incredibly entertaining, but it promotes problem-solving, and encourages observational and cognitive skills within young children.

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: Shaping Up
programme.desc: Join Shaping Up as the happy and smiling geometric shapes introduce shapes to younger audiences and combine to create various objects that children will recognise from their everyday world. Developing babies proper shape-recognition from using vibrant colours a smooth transitions, Shaping Up combines educative aspects so that babies are able to develop their image recognition and creative skills.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: Color Clara
programme.desc: Clara is an extraordinary, extra colourful, chameleon girl. Deep in the jungle in her cosy chameleon house, Clara uses her colour changing powers for good by helping her wrongly coloured jungles friends and objects to return to their natural colour. This exciting jungle tale helps young viewers to connect objects to their usual colours, developing their basic visual skills..

programme.title: The Shapies
programme.desc: The protagonists of The Shapies introduce us to the world of shapes through their adventures. They show us where they fit in, what things they resemble, how they transform if they are together and how they make up entire stories.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: As is the case with many Duck TV programmes, this programme is designed to both educate and entertain its young audience. This cartoon takes a look into the lives of a range of the cutest baby animals, and explores their family relationships. The cartoon develops social skills and understanding family relationships, alongside improving the ability to recognise different animals, too.

programme.title: Sounds Around Us

Through this show, it will teach your child about developing social skills, teach them the values of friendship and join Mimo and Bobo on their adventures and experience them together! Encourage your little ones and ask them questions about their journey through each episode.

programme.title: Happy Meadow
programme.desc: Two happy rabbits, Sari and Nati have lots of fun playing in Happy Meadow, in this childrens cartoon. They have plenty of other lovable friends who also live in Happy Meadow with them. Duck TV aim to produce content for young children that is educating, and aids their development, while being entertaining at the same time. Children are encouraged to grow their vocabulary and recognise colours.

programme.title: Albert Explains
programme.desc: Professor Albert uses his incredible knowledge to demonstrate the use of everyday objects, in this Duck TV production. Duck TV aims to produce content thats both entertaining and informative, so that children may learn new skills in a fun and creative way. In this particular skills, the Professor helps children develop their cognotive skills, so that they can grow up to be as clever as him.

programme.title: ABC - duckBC
programme.desc: Writing skills introduced, explained and developed through the animated adventures of the five stalwarts of the art of penmanship: Pen, Pencil, Stamp, Eraser and Brush. From A to Z, the five friends take children through the steps to produce beautiful letters and write wonderful words.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: In the Museum
programme.desc: In a big museum full of beautiful art something peculiar keeps happening. Every now and then an animal disappears from the paintings. Can you help Mr.Clown as he journeys around the museum in search of his missing friends? In a great introduction to different types of art, In the Museum helps to reinforce shape recognition and improve young viewers ability to recognise and identify different animals.

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Whats Your Job?
programme.desc: "Whats Your Job" introduces younger audiences to various professions in society and combines education with enjoyment. When watching this series, parents are advised to talk about the jobs that are being shown so that they are able to learn why people do the profession that they do. Encouraging education and fun, this show introduces children to new words that they can learn but in a creative way.

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Learn how important water is to life on earth. This informative animation is something adults and children can enjoy together, while learning about animal habits and their habitats. Making the world of water come to life, help your child recognise and name animals to increase cognitive processes and strengthen memory. Submerge yourself in a world of fish and dont miss out.

programme.title: Color Magic
programme.desc: Watch as happy smiley blobs of paint in red, green, blue and yellow, dance across the screen, colouring in the outlined picture as they go, transforming dull and lifeless pictures into colourful and vibrant masterpieces. Let your imagination run wild with this simple but fun colouring show whilst also developing your basic visual skills, stimulating colour and shape recognition and identification.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Partners in Fun
programme.desc: Go on countless adventures and mess around with this adorable duo. Join a baby monkey and bear-cub as they play around, making friends and having fun. Get your little one to interact with the show by identifying colours as they come onto the screen for extra learning.

programme.title: City Life
programme.desc: Learn all about everyday life in the city. Come along as we meet the places, vehicles, people and animals that we find in our city. programme.title: The Way We Travel
programme.desc: When viewing this cartoon, your child will watch various vehicles, which will, in turn, make them aware of a variety of different shapes and objects in the real world. For the littlest viewers, this sport-tastic show promotes motor skills and movement, increasing muscle strength and balance!

programme.title: Space Adventures
programme.desc: In this childrens cartoon that focuses on animals and other imagined creatures travelling through space, children are encouraged to think creatively, and widen their vocabulary. Duck TV produces content that aids child development, that is both entertaining and educational. Children are encouraged to name objects, improving language, and its very creative, encouraging imaginative thinking.

programme.title: Ding Dang Dong
programme.desc: Children are encouraged to join in with a range of different dances, building on their coordination and motor skills in the process. This is a Duck TV production. Duck TV seeks to create content that is both engaging and fun, but also educational. This makes learning new things fun and easy!

programme.title: Get Up!
programme.desc: We should not just sit in front of the TV! Lets stand up and move. Langi, Rundi and Rendi exercise, imitating the movements of Nature. Lets keep up with them to improve our coordination and strengthen our health.

programme.title: The World of Animals
programme.desc: This childrens cartoon is both educational and entertaining. Children will develop their knowledge on animals, so that they cannot only name animals, but they have a basic understanding of how and where they might live. Children can then apply this knowledge to their everyday lives, either in zoos, or even parks. As a result, children have greater respect for and interest in the environment.

programme.title: Dance
programme.desc: Come and join the dance party! Get up and get moving with these three adorable characters as they dance around the screen to different songs and tunes. Dance is an excellent way to develop young viewers musical skills, the sense of rhythm and even their listening skills, setting them up for a bright future. And lets be honest, everyone loves to have a good dance.

programme.title: Elf World
programme.desc: Two elves join together to explore Dreamworld, and they want you to come along, too! As with many of the Duck TV productions, there is also an educational purpose to this bright and engaging cartoon. This will enhance your childs creativity and encourage them to think creatively, while keeping them entertained throughout.

programme.title: Get Up!

programme.title: We Are Playing Now
programme.desc: Educational childrens magazine exploring the world around us, including familiar people and objects through drawing and painting. It helps children develop cognitive skills, as well as parent-child emotional relations, introducing them to different situations.

programme.title: Listen to This
programme.desc: This fun and colourful cartoon will keep your kids entertained, and also teach them a couple of creative skills on the way, through encouraging young children to pair sounds to animals and musical instruments. The programme will introduce key musical instruments, and improve sound recognition. This is a Duck TV production, designed to aid child development.

programme.title: Vege-tales
programme.desc: In Veggie-tales, childrens animated series, talking fruit and vegetable perform theatrical productions based on very kind stories. Main characters Bob the Tomato and Larry the Cucumber with the help of other vegetables are telling stories and teaching kids the basic human values, like honesty, thankfulness, kindness.

programme.title: Sunville
programme.desc: Follow the lives of the animal families of Sunville in these playful silent animated shorts. Encourage your child to join in with the narration of the stories to help them learn new words, identify objects and sounds, and develop their early social skills. Creatively develop your childs imagination as you discover what an average day looks like in their friendly little village.

programme.title: Colorwheel
programme.desc: One brave little pup is determined to find his friend, who is lost in the forest. He uses his trusty colour wheel to navigate his way, using skills of reasoning and logic. This programme is a Duck TV production, that intends to educate its audience, alongside entertaining them. In this series, children will develop skills such as problem solving, decision making, and also knowledge around colour.

programme.title: Beklenti Raporu
programme.desc: Gunun ekonomik takviminde neler var? Gunun one çıkan haberleri neler? İç ve dış kuresel piyasalardaki son gelişmeler ve beklentiler neler?

programme.title: İlk Seans
programme.desc: Yurt içi ve yurt dışı gelişmeler, Borsa İstanbul açılışını nasıl etkileyecek? Açılış itibariyle hangi hisseler en fazla yukselip hangi hisseler değer kaybedecek? Gunun one çıkan şirket haberleri ve daha fazlası İlk Seansta.

programme.title: Paratoner
programme.desc: Borsa İstanbulda işlemler bu programla başlıyor. Murat Tufan finans dunyasının uzmanlarıyla zorlu piyasa koşullarında hızla değişen rakamları sade ve anlaşılır bir dille Paratoner programında izleyiciler için yorumluyor.

programme.title: Gun Sonu
programme.desc: Yurt içi ve kuresel piyasalar gunu nasıl tamamlıyor? Gelecek gunden beklentiler neler? Gunun tum konuşulanlarını, yarının gundemini Özlem Karakullukçu, konukları ve muhabirleri ile değerlendiriyor. Özlem Karakullukçu ile Gun Sonu, hafta içi her gun saat 16:30da Ekoturkte!

programme.title: Son Seans

programme.title: The Nut Job
programme.desc: The Nut Job (2014) is a 3D computer-animated comedy directed by Peter Lepeniotis and starring the voices of Will Arnett and Brendan Fraser. A squirrel named Surly and his best friend Buddy are the inhabitants of a noisy metropolis. Its not easy to survive there and they dont get enough to eat quite often. But one day the friends come across a store that is full of nuts. Soon thereafter, Surly discovers that the owners of the shop are real criminals who are going to rob a bank.

programme.title: City Grammar: Kings Cross
programme.desc: City Grammar _ learning and sightseeing at the same time. English Grammar with elementary examples straight from the very heart of London.

programme.title: City Grammar: Granary Square
programme.desc: City Grammar _ learning and sightseeing at the same time. English Grammar with elementary examples straight from the very heart of London.

programme.title: One Chance
programme.desc: One Chance (2013) is a biographical drama directed by David Frankel and starring James Corden and Julie Walters. Paul Potts is a 37-year-old shop assistant who lives in the attic of his parents house and dreams of singing on the stage. At the TV show Britains Got Talent Paul gets a chance to prove his worth, win the first season of the show and hearts of millions with his phenomenal voice.

programme.title: Here and There
programme.desc: Here and There is an educational programme that reveals interesting facts and tells about different events. The host of the programme uses easily understandable language. The viewers at these levels have no difficulty in following the presenters speech. The show can help you boost your vocabulary.

programme.desc: Little inventors will be able to enrich their vocabulary and make a toy for their very own collection. In this episode, were going to make a picture frame.

programme.title: Euronews Now
programme.desc: Detailed and insightful coverage of the top stories from around the globe as they happen showing their significance and relevance to the modern world in which they occur. programme.title: 2F1B
programme.desc: Futbol dunyanın en onemli yan çizgisidir. En son spor haberlerini kaçırmayın. 2F1B ile ilgili haber sonuçları FB TVde. Maçla ilgili en onemli yorumları ve olayları ekranlarınızda sunarız.

programme.title: Voleybol: Turkiye Kadınlar Ligi
programme.desc: Resmi olarak Sultanlar Ligi olarak adlandırılan Turkiye Kadınlar Voleybol Ligi, Turkiyenin en yuksek profesyonel kadın voleybol ligidir.

programme.title: Guncel
programme.desc: Futbol dunyanın en onemli yan çizgisidir. En son spor haberlerini kaçırmayın. Guncel ile ilgili haber sonuçları FB TVda. Maçla ilgili en onemli yorumları ve olayları ekranlarınızda sunarız.

programme.title: Basketbol: Tekerlekli Sandalye Super Ligi
programme.desc: Tekerlekli Sandalye Basketbol Super Ligi, Turkiye Bedensel Engelliler Spor Federasyonu ( TBESF ) tarafından duzenlenen ve tekerlekli sandalye basketbolunda, Turkiyede en ust ligdir.

programme.title: Tarihte Bugun
programme.desc: Futbol tarihinin en iyi hamleleri hakkında bir program. Futbol geçmişindeki en guzel anlardan bazılarını, en iyi futbolcuları ve oyundaki başyapıtlarını hatırlayarak.

programme.title: Basketbol: Euroleague
programme.desc: EuroLeague, sponsorluk adıyla Turkish Airlines EuroLeague, Avrupada 2000den beri Euroleague Basketball tarafından duzenlenen en ust duzeydeki ve kazananın Avrupa Şampiyonu olarak adlandırıldığı uluslararası profesyonel basketbol turnuvası

programme.title: Sportif
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe spor takımlarını tum yonleriyle ekranlara getiren "Sportif" programı FB TV ekranlarında yayınlanıyor. Futboldan voleybola, atletizmden yuzmeye kadar her alanda faaliyet gosteren Fenerbahçenin Turk sporuna olan katkıları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Yarının Yıldızları
programme.desc: Fenerbahçenin tum yaş gruplarında yapılan çift kale maçlardan Yarının Yıldızlarında takip edin.

programme.title: Gunun Roportajı
programme.desc: Sıcak ve en onemli spor haberleri her Gunun Roportajı programımızda bulabilirsiniz.. Programımızda sporla ilgili tum guncel olayları takip edin. Fenerbahçe Televizyon da sizlerle.

programme.title: Sportif
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe spor takımlarını tum yonleriyle ekranlara getiren "Sportif" programı FB TV ekranlarında yayınlanıyor. Futboldan voleybola, atletizmden yuzmeye kadar her alanda faaliyet gosteren Fenerbahçenin Turk sporuna olan katkıları değerlendiriliyor.

programme.title: Basketbol: Kadınlar Super Ligi
programme.desc: Basketbol Super Ligi, sponsorluk adıyla ING Basketbol Super Ligi, 1966 yılında Turkiye Basketbol Federasyonu tarafından kurulan ve Turkiyedeki en ust duzey profesyonel basketbol ligi. Normal lig karşılamaları, 16 takım arasında, her takımın biri kendi sahasında diğeri rakip takımın sahasında olmak uzere deplasmanlı, iki devreli ve lig usulu oynanır.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Fenerium Saati
programme.desc: Fenerbahçe TV _ Beril Bokenin sunumu ile Feneriumun birbirinden renkli ve çeşitli urunleri Fenerium Saati programımızda sizlerle. Fenerbahçe TV yeni urunleri gosteriliyor.

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.desc: EuroLeague, sponsorluk adıyla Turkish Airlines EuroLeague, Avrupada 2000den beri Euroleague Basketball tarafından duzenlenen en ust duzeydeki ve kazananın Avrupa Şampiyonu olarak adlandırıldığı uluslararası profesyonel basketbol turnuvası

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Tarihte Bugun
programme.desc: Futbol tarihinin en iyi hamleleri hakkında bir program. Futbol geçmişindeki en guzel anlardan bazılarını, en iyi futbolcuları ve oyundaki başyapıtlarını hatırlayarak.

programme.title: Basketbol: Kadınlar Super Ligi
programme.desc: Basketbol Super Ligi, sponsorluk adıyla ING Basketbol Super Ligi, 1966 yılında Turkiye Basketbol Federasyonu tarafından kurulan ve Turkiyedeki en ust duzey profesyonel basketbol ligi. Normal lig karşılamaları, 16 takım arasında, her takımın biri kendi sahasında diğeri rakip takımın sahasında olmak uzere deplasmanlı, iki devreli ve lig usulu oynanır.

programme.title: Haber
programme.desc: Turkiyede ve dunyada yaşanan onemli gelişmelerin ayrıntıları izleyiciye taşınıyor. Siyasetten ekonomiye, spordan sanata, gundemi oluşturan haberlerin aktarıldığı programda, hava-yol durumu guncellemeleri de ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Soz Taraftarda
programme.desc: Fenerbahçemizin ve Turk Futbolunun gundemini, yapacağımız maçların skorlarını Buyuk Fenerbahçe Taraftarına sorduğumuz Soz Taraftarda programının bolumlerinde.

programme.title: Basketbol: Super Lig
programme.desc: Turk basketbolunun başlangıcı, ligin 1966da kurulmasından çok oncelere dayanmaktadır. Turkiyede bowling 20. yuzyılın başlarında biliniyordu. 1904 yılında İstanbuldaki Robert Kolej oğrencileri bu takım sporunun cazibesini ilk kez keşfettiler. Ligin kuruluşundan bir yıl sonra, en iyi Turk basketbol kuluplerinin ilk resmi yarışması başladı.

programme.title: Maç Havası

programme.title: Gunun Nabzı
programme.desc: Haber Globalde, deneyimli televizyon habercisi Saynur Tezel, hafta içi her gun saat 15.00da "Gunun Nabzı"nı tutuyor. Siyaset, ekonomi, diplomasi, strateji ve toplumsal gelişmelere dair bilinmesi gereken ne varsa "Gunun Nabzı"nda ekrana taşınıyor.

programme.title: Ters Bakış
programme.desc: Onur Çavuşoğlunun sunduğu Ters Bakış programı, olaylara ve konulara farklı bir açıdan bakış sunarak izleyicilere yeni perspektifler kazandırıyor. programme.title: Surmanşet
programme.desc: Dunya, Turkiye ve Eskişehir gundemine dair onemli haberlerin ve analizlerinin yer alacağı Surmanşet Kanal26 ekranlarında

programme.title: Kanal 7de Sabah
programme.desc: Gune hoş bir başlangıç yapmak ve gunceli yakalamak istiyorsanız hafta boyunca ekrana gelen Kanal 7de Sabahı sakın kaçırmayın.

programme.title: Elif
programme.desc: Macera dolu sahneleriyle soluk soluğa izlenen Elifte Melek nihayet kızına kavuşur. Uzun uğraşlar sonucu birbirini Haktanırlar konağında bulan Melek ve Elif konaktan ayrılmaya karar verir. Tam konaktan ayrılacakları esnada Tarıkın adamı onları yakalar ve Meleki vurur. Elifi kaçırmak uzereyken Melek mudahale eder ve kızını adamın elinden kurtarır. Elifi de alıp kimsenin bilmediği bir yerde yeni bir hayat kurmak isteyen Melek izini kaybettirmeyi başarır.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Haber Saati
programme.desc: Tumer Doğrunun sunumuyla ekrana gelen Kanal 7 Haber Saati, Haber Merkezinin guçlu ekibi tarafından hazırlanırken gundemdeki gelişmelere ayrıntılı ve en doğru şekilde yer veriyor. Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan en son gelişmeleri, siyasetin nabzını sıcağı sıcağına Kanal 7 Haber Saati aracılığıyla izleyiciye aktarıyor.

programme.title: Kanal 7de Sabah
programme.desc: Gune hoş bir başlangıç yapmak ve gunceli yakalamak istiyorsanız hafta boyunca ekrana gelen Kanal 7de Sabahı sakın kaçırmayın.

programme.title: Kanal 7 Haber Saati
programme.desc: Tumer Doğrunun sunumuyla ekrana gelen Kanal 7 Haber Saati, Haber Merkezinin guçlu ekibi tarafından hazırlanırken gundemdeki gelişmelere ayrıntılı ve en doğru şekilde yer veriyor. Turkiye ve dunyada yaşanan en son gelişmeleri, siyasetin nabzını sıcağı sıcağına Kanal 7 Haber Saati aracılığıyla izleyiciye aktarıyor.

programme.title: Zalim İstanbul
programme.desc: Lojistik sektorunun devlerinden, Agah Karaçay çocukluğunda geçirdiği kaza nedeni ile tekerlekli sandalyeye mahkum kalan yeğenine memleketinden bir gelin aramaktadır. Teklif evin yadigarı tarafından memleketlisi, babaanne Nerimana ulaşır. Neriman, memleketlisi Seher’i ikna etmek için usta bir duzenbazlığa girişir...

programme.title: Kuzey Guney
programme.desc: Kuzey ve Guney, pusuladaki iki farklı yon gibi, karakterleri ve hayalleriyle de farklı iki kardeştir. Birbirlerine olan bağlılıkları dışında tek ortak noktalarıysa, babaları Sami’nin işlettiği simit fırınına sığamayacak kadar buyuk hayallerinin olmasıdır. Ancak iki kardeşin hayallerinin gerçeğe donuşebilmesi için kaderlerini de değiştirmeleri gerekecektir.

programme.title: Öyle Bir Geçer Zaman Ki
programme.desc: Hikaye, 1967 yılında, İstanbul’un eski semtlerinden birinde başlayan ve gunumuze kadar surecek olan bir zamanı dilimini içeriyor. 1960lı yıllarda, kocasının kendisine yaptığı onca kotuluğu ve yaşadığı aile dramını unutamamış, bir evladını torununun doğumunda kaybetmiş bir annenin ve aynı zamanda kendisine ait bir konfeksiyon atolyesinin sahibi olan Cemilenin, kızları Berrin ve Aylin; oğulları Mete ve Osman, kayınvalidesi Hasefe Hanım, damatları ve torunları ile verdiği mucadeleye tanık olacaksınız.

programme.title: Yaprak Dokumu
programme.desc: Butun hayatını beş çocuğuna iyi bir ahlak vermeye adayan Ali Rıza Bey, bir haksızlığa goz yumması istenince kaymakamlık gorevinden istifa eder. Kızları Neclanın da universiteyi kazanmasıyla Ali Rıza Bey ve ailesi İstanbula yerleşmeye karar verir. Fakat Ali Rıza Bey, doğup buyuduğu şehri çok değişmiş bulur. Bu farklı çevrede çocukların istekleri de değişmeye başlamıştır. Buyuk şehir hayatının getirdiği ekonomik krizler kaçınılmazdır. Ali Rıza Bey, ekonomik gucuyle birlikte otoritesini de kaybetmiştir. Darbeler ardarda gelir. Ruzgar sert esmekte, ağacın yaprakları birer birer dokulmektedir...

programme.title: Kanal D Haber Gun Arası
programme.desc: Dunyada ve Turkiyede yaşanan son dakika gelişmeleri, siyaset ve ekonomi haberleri, gundem belirleyen ozel haberler...

programme.title: Uzak Şehir
programme.desc: Eşinin vasiyeti uzerine onu doğduğu topraklara defnetmek için Mardine getirmesi, Alyayı donuşu olmayan bir yolculuğa çıkarır. Kocası Borana karşı son gorevini yerine getirdikten sonra çocuğuyla Kanadaya donmek isteyen Alya, tore ve geleneklerin kanun yerine geçtiği Albora ailesinin acımasız yuzuyle karşılaşır. Aile oğlunu kendisine vermez. Oğluyla kaçmak için yaptığı hamle onu ve çocuğunu buyuk bir tehlikeye atarak ebedi savaşın ateşini de yakar.

programme.title: Aşk-ı Memnu
programme.desc: Çocukları ve uzak akraba çocuğu Behlul ile İstanbul’un en onemli yalılarından birinde yaşayan Adnan Bey, Firdevs Hanım’ın kızı Bihter’le yıllar sonra tekrar karşılaştıktan sonra, unuttuğu duyguları yeniden hatırlamaya başlar. Firdevs Hanım çok hırslı bir kadındır. Kızlarıyla rekabet halindedir. Kızı Bihter, babasının olumunden sorumlu tuttuğu annesine kin duymakta ve onun kızı olarak anılmaktan buyuk utanç duymaktadır. Bihter, Adnan Bey’le karşılaştığında onun guvenli elini tutar ve yeni hayatına doğru yurumeye başlar. Bihter, Adnan Bey’in koşkunde mutluluğu ararken, tutkuyla tanışır. Behlul ve Bihter birbirlerine doğru suruklenirler. Yasak aşkları bu ailedeki herkesi ayrı ayrı etkileyecektir.

programme.title: Kanal D Ana Haber
programme.desc: Gundemin nabzının tutulduğu ve son dakika gelişmelerinin ekrana aktarıldığı Kanal D Ana Haber, Deniz Bayramoğlu’nun sunumuyla ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: Thor
programme.desc: Duşuncesiz tavırlarıyla neredeyse antik bir savaşı tekrar başlatacak olan guçlu ve kibirli savaşçı Thor, babası tarafından Dunyaya surgun edilir ve insanlar arasında yaşamaya mecbur bırakılır. Ait olduğu dunyanın en tehlikeli kotu adamı, karanlık istila guçlerini Dunya’yı ele geçirmek için yollayınca kahramanımız Thor, gerçek kimliğini ortaya koymak için ne yapması gerektiğini oğrenecektir.

programme.title: Thor
programme.desc: Duşuncesiz tavırlarıyla neredeyse antik bir savaşı tekrar başlatacak olan guçlu ve kibirli savaşçı Thor, babası tarafından Dunyaya surgun edilir ve insanlar arasında yaşamaya mecbur bırakılır. Ait olduğu dunyanın en tehlikeli kotu adamı, karanlık istila guçlerini Dunya’yı ele geçirmek için yollayınca kahramanımız Thor, gerçek kimliğini ortaya koymak için ne yapması gerektiğini oğrenecektir.

programme.title: Ayın Kopek Balığı Yuzu
programme.desc: Onlarca yıl once, SSCB oldurulemez kopekbalıkları geliştirir ve onları aya fırlatır. Bugun ise, Amerikalı astronotlardan oluşan bir ekip bu tehdit karşısında hayatlarının mucadelesini yaşayacaktır.

programme.title: Dizi Kuşağı
programme.desc: Bir sonraki bolumu tatmin edici bir beklenti ve istekle izleyebilmeniz için dizi size belirsizlik ve kuçuk bir doz coşku verecektir.

programme.title: Dizi Kuşağı
programme.desc: Bir sonraki bolumu tatmin edici bir beklenti ve istekle izleyebilmeniz için dizi size belirsizlik ve kuçuk bir doz coşku verecektir.

programme.title: Lemur Adası Çeteleri
programme.desc: Yavrular buyudukçe her birlikte yeni guç mucadeleleri patlak veriyor. Acımasız Kraliçe Crystalden duşuk rutbeli Ericaya kadar, her uyenin doğru konuma gelmek için etkili yontemlerle yarışmalarını izleyin. Bu sırada yavrular, muttefiklerin ve duşmanların kendi geleceklerini nasıl şekillendireceğini anlamaya başlıyorlar.

programme.title: Lemur Adası Çeteleri
programme.desc: Yiyecek bulma baskısı yeni boyutlara ulaşır ve rezervi kargaşaya surukler. Saflarda ortaya çıkan tanık kırılmaları, çeteleri boler ve Harabeler çetesinin yılmaz lideri Crystalı daha once hiç olmadığı kadar zorlu bir mucadeleye surukler.

programme.title: Yavru Kampı
programme.desc: Winston ve X kızları yeni temiz hava alanlarına taşınırken açık hava becerilerini keşfedin ve Yasmine ile Yaranın anaokulundaki guç mucadelesine tanık olun. Aniden topallaması çıkış tarihini erteleyen huzursuz bir yıllık yavru Victora goz atın.

programme.title: Arabistan Denizleri
programme.desc: Deniz kaplumbağası dunyadaki en eski hayvanlardan biridir. Bu antik denizciler dinozorlardan dahi once yaşamışlardır. 100 milyonu aşkın sure boyunca, gorece değişmeden varlıklarını korumuşlardır. Ancak şimdi, hayatta kalan turlerin yedisinin de nesli tukenmek uzere.

programme.title: Keşfedilmemiş Manzaralar
programme.desc: Meksikanın doğusundaki bu nefes kesen bolgede yağmur ormanları Karayip Denizi ile buluşuyor. Balta girmez ormana yolculuk edin, gizemli su altı mağaralarına dalın ve Meksikanın en buyuk avcısı olan şu hayvanın sığınağı olan yemyeşil bataklıkların içinde ilerleyin Morelet timsahı.

programme.title: Vahşi Kopekler Suru ile Koşmak
programme.desc: Bir av sırasında Manzi surusunu yakalayan Julz ile bir vahşi kopek avı filmi çekin ve yağmurların gelmesini bekleyen Kakuli surusu buyuk riskler alırken leoparlar ve sırtlanlara karşı dikkat kesilin. Leylek Kolonisinden geri donen bir erkekle birlikte destansı bir ava çıkın.

programme.title: Arabistan Denizleri
programme.desc: Deniz kaplumbağası dunyadaki en eski hayvanlardan biridir. Bu antik denizciler dinozorlardan dahi once yaşamışlardır. 100 milyonu aşkın sure boyunca, gorece değişmeden varlıklarını korumuşlardır. Ancak şimdi, hayatta kalan turlerin yedisinin de nesli tukenmek uzere.

programme.title: Keşfedilmemiş Manzaralar
programme.desc: Meksikanın doğusundaki bu nefes kesen bolgede yağmur ormanları Karayip Denizi ile buluşuyor. Balta girmez ormana yolculuk edin, gizemli su altı mağaralarına dalın ve Meksikanın en buyuk avcısı olan şu hayvanın sığınağı olan yemyeşil bataklıkların içinde ilerleyin Morelet timsahı.

programme.title: Amerikanın Vahşi Mevsimleri
programme.desc: İlkbahar geldi kur yapma ve yeni yaşam mevsimi. Arizonanın yağmura doyan çolunde patlak veren tomurcuklardan yuvalarından sıçrayan tuylu orman ordeği yavrularına kadar, binbir biçimde uykusundan uyanan doğaya tanık olun.

programme.title: Dunyada Evrim
programme.desc: Sahradan taşraya, hayvanların bize ısınan dunyamızda nasıl hayatta kalacağımızı oğrettiği uç noktalara gidin. Şempanzelerle birlikte mağaralarda barının, develerin tuzlu suyu yudumlayışını gorun ve zebra ispinozlarının yavrularını kuçultmek için yumurtalarına şarkı soyleyişini dinleyin.

programme.title: Dunyada Evrim
programme.desc: Hayvanların bilim insanlarına gelecekteki varlığımız hakkında ipuçları verdiği, gezegenin hızla eriyen kutuplarına doğru bir yolculuk yapın. Kutup ayılarının, penguenlerin ve diğer kutup canlılarının hareketlerinin insanların kuresel ısınmayı haritalandırmasına (ve onlemesine) nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini oğrenin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Amazonda ne kadar ağaç bulabilirsiniz ve burada yaşamak nasıl bir şey? Golgelikler arasında seyahat edin ve 1200den fazla ağaç turunun nasıl bir arada yaşadığını gorun. Ayrıca, bu ağaçları evi addeden maymunları ve diğer canlıları takip edin.

programme.title: Doğa Seferleri
programme.desc: Fil Geçiş Evine yeni bir ziyaretçi geldi bir rezervin yakınına terk edilmiş hasta bir fil yavrusu, insanlar ve filler arasındaki arazi savaşının bir başka kurbanı. Dr. Pruthu Fernandonun onderliğinde bu çatışmayı sona erdirmeye yonelik yenilikçi çabaları inceleyin.

programme.title: Vahşi Kopekler Suru ile Koşmak
programme.desc: Duygu yoğunluğu yaşayan Julz kopek surulerine veda ederken yağmurları sevinçle karşılayın. Julz Leylek Kolonisi yavrularının beç tavuğu avladığını keşfeder ve Kakuli yavrularının bir antilop leşiyle beslendiğini gorunce neşesi yerine gelir. Oyuncu Manzi surusu zorlu bir yaban domuzunu koşeye sıkıştırır.

programme.title: Dunyada Evrim
programme.desc: Sahradan taşraya, hayvanların bize ısınan dunyamızda nasıl hayatta kalacağımızı oğrettiği uç noktalara gidin. Şempanzelerle birlikte mağaralarda barının, develerin tuzlu suyu yudumlayışını gorun ve zebra ispinozlarının yavrularını kuçultmek için yumurtalarına şarkı soyleyişini dinleyin.

programme.title: Dunyada Evrim
programme.desc: Hayvanların bilim insanlarına gelecekteki varlığımız hakkında ipuçları verdiği, gezegenin hızla eriyen kutuplarına doğru bir yolculuk yapın. Kutup ayılarının, penguenlerin ve diğer kutup canlılarının hareketlerinin insanların kuresel ısınmayı haritalandırmasına (ve onlemesine) nasıl yardımcı olabileceğini oğrenin.

programme.title: Amerikanın Vahşi Mevsimleri
programme.desc: Yaz mevsimi uzun ve sıcak gunler getirir, doğal yaşam boylece hayat bulur. Bu kısa mevsimden en iyi şekilde yararlanmaya çalışan hayvanların yeni becerileri oğrenmelerini, eş bulmak için yarışmalarını ve avcılardan kaçmalarını izleyin.

programme.title: En İyi Arkadaşım Bir Hayvan
programme.desc: Yolculuk yapan bir tavukla Amerikayı dolaşın ve bir İngiliz bahçesinde yaşayan bir fare ailesiyle tanışın. Bir orumceğin yardımıyla araknofobiyi yenin, Dunyanın son iki kuzey beyaz gergedanının koruyucusuyla yuruyuşe çıkın ve daha fazla turler arası dostluğu kutlayın.

programme.title: En İyi Arkadaşım Bir Hayvan
programme.desc: Kakadu ve ornitorenklerin yeni kariyerlere nasıl ilham verdiğini oğrenin, ardından bir insan ve bir fili omur boyu birbirine bağlayan ortak travmayı keşfedin. 35 yaşındaki hindi akbabası George ile şakalaşın ve insan eliyle yetiştirilen kangurulara dokunaklı biçimde veda edin.

programme.title: Amazonda Hayatta Kalmak
programme.desc: Kurak mevsim yılın en zor zamanıdır. Duşuk su seviyeleri ve alanın azalması nedeniyle, hayvanların hayatta kalmak için hızla yeni beceriler oğrenmeleri gerekir... ve bunu yapmazlarsa, yırtıcı akbabalar ziyafet için uzerlerine çullanır.

programme.title: Doğa Seferleri
programme.desc: Sri Lankanın sık ormanlarında şapkalı makak maymunu gizlenir. Sadece bu adaya ozel olan, grup halinde yaşayan bu enerjik maymunlar dunyada başka hiçbir yerde bulunmaz. Bu hayvanlar, gerçekleştirilmiş en uzun primat araştırma projesinin de odak noktasıdır. Dr Wolfgang Dittus onların karmaşık toplumunu anlamanın peşinde.

programme.title: Dunyada Evrim
programme.desc: Sahradan taşraya, hayvanların bize ısınan dunyamızda nasıl hayatta kalacağımızı oğrettiği uç noktalara gidin. Şempanzelerle birlikte mağaralarda barının, develerin tuzlu suyu yudumlayışını gorun ve zebra ispinozlarının yavrularını kuçultmek için yumurtalarına şarkı soyleyişini dinleyin.

programme.title: Dunyada Evrim

programme.title: Yavru Kampı
programme.desc: Doğaya salınmaya hazırlanırken ağaçlara tırmanmayı ve yiyecek aramayı oğrenen yaz yavrularını izleyin. Yeni gelenlerin haline şaşırın, kış uykusu oncesi yeme alemini gozlemleyin ve ayı dostu bir Şukran Gununun tadını çıkarın.

programme.title: Kukuli
programme.desc: Şarkılarıyla milyonların kalbinde taht kuran sevimli çizgi film karakteri Kukuli ve arkadaşları Tinky, Minky, Dutdut ve Şinekin en yeni maceraları, birbirinden eğlenceli oğretici çocuk şarkıları, kısa komik videoları ekrana geliyor.

programme.title: İstanbul Muhafızları
programme.desc: İstanbulu ne kadar tanıyorsun? Kimbilir bilmediğin ne çok şey var? İşte sana eğlenceli bir fırsat. Mehmet, Zeynep, Elif ve Ali ile birlikte İstanbulu hem karış karış tanıyacak, hem de her bolumde Gurgen ve adamlarının yaşattığı problemleri çozeceksin.

programme.title: Briko
programme.desc: Evimizdeki sıradan malzemelerle oyunlar uretmek, oyuncaklar yapmak mumkun. Briko ile her bolumde onlarca yaratıcı fikri hayata geçirmeyi, kullanışlı eşyalar yapmayı ve gundelik eşyalara farklı bir gozle bakmayı oğreniyoruz. En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.

programme.title: Oscars Oasis
programme.desc: Kavurucu sıcakların ortasında bir çolde Kertenkele Oscar’ın su ve yemek ararken karşılaştığı komik ve talihsiz olaylar dizisi... Bu macerada Oscar’ın şanssızlığı yemek ve su arayan tek kişinin o olmaması... Tilki Popy, Sırtlan Harchi ve Akbaba Buck da aynı arayışın içinde ve çelimsiz Kertenkele Oscar’a kıyasla biraz daha guçluler.

programme.title: Briko
programme.desc: Evimizdeki sıradan malzemelerle oyunlar uretmek, oyuncaklar yapmak mumkun. Briko ile her bolumde onlarca yaratıcı fikri hayata geçirmeyi, kullanışlı eşyalar yapmayı ve gundelik eşyalara farklı bir gozle bakmayı oğreniyoruz. En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.

En yakın arkadaşı Hepi ile birlikte çeşitli objelerden birbirinden eğlenceli oyuncaklar yapan Briko, hayal gucumuzu ve el becerimizi geliştirmemize de yardımcı olacak. “Kendin Yap” konsepti uzerine kurulmuş Briko’da boş bir yumurta kutusunun bir gozluğe ya da bir saksıya donuşmesi mumkun.
